name: the pet shop
description:
This game prototype was created for NYU Game Design on the topic of game characteristics.

INSTRUCTIONS

Use ARROW KEYS to move left and right, SPACE to jump, LEFT SHIFT to hold onto the wall and climb, F to be invisible and G to toggle it off, and LEFT SHIFT to grapple onto light bulbs. 

LORE

A supposedly normal pet shop that turns out to be a place where illegal breeding and experimentation occurs in the secret laboratories below…

You are the chameleon, trying to escape and become free.

PRESENTATION on game design
